name: Taskrabbit Clone Script
short_description: Taskrabbit Clone is an online marketplace that gives you the opportunity to save time and live a more laid-back and less stressful life. Taskrabbit Clone gives you the chance to finally get everything done that you need to do every day. We use the power of the people to get things done for you. In essence, we have formed a virtual community where neighbors help each other to do tasks. We use the power of social as well as mobile technology to help you to accomplish the things that you need to do. We put you in touch with friendly and dependable people who will help you to get your tasks completed so that you can have time for other things.
